metadata.Title: CVE-2020-7595 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
xmlStringLenDecodeEntities in parser.c in libxml2 2.9.10 has an infinite loop in a certain end-of-file situation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-7595` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.13+esm1
libxml2-utils - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.13+esm1
python-libxml2 - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.13+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.13+esm1').
